name: TargetedScan
overview: Adds POST /Library/ScanPath endpoint for targeted library scanning without full library scans
description: Allows external tools like Autopulse, Sonarr, or Radarr to trigger a targeted library scan for a specific filesystem path. Creates new items (Series, Season, Episode) instantly using ResolvePath + CreateItem, then queues metadata refresh. No full library scan needed.

versions.changelog: Skip ValidateChildren on library roots (fixes full library scan for movies), ancestor metadata refresh for proper provider ID cascading
Fire-and-forget ValidateChildren: API responds instantly instead of blocking 30+ seconds while metadata refresh runs in background
Fix item visibility: replace QueueRefresh with ValidateChildren for proper parent-child registration and metadata refresh
Per-parent locking for parallel creates, FindByPath cache across batches, extract walk-up before lock
